snippet: The strike, which was called in response to a Taliban attack in Sangin district, resulted in the deaths of a mother and five of her children.
abstract: American military claims responsibility and expresses regret for an airstrike that mistakenly killed six members of a family in southwestern Afghanistan.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting from Kabul, and Farooq Mangal from Khost, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: The strike, which was called in response to a Taliban attack in Sangin district, resulted in the deaths of a mother and five of her children.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Confirms Airstrike Wrongly Killed 6 in an Afghan Family
